page.title: 18SOCIETIES & EVENTS II
page.content: {THE FIREWORK CLUB }puts on a display on November 5th on in the Sports Field. They sell tickets in advance.{ {THE KEEP FIT CLUB }is held at the village hall at 8.00am to 9.00am for ladies every Monday they do all kinds of exerises. {SUNDAY SCHOOL}There are two Sunday schools in Broughton, the Baptist Church and St.Mary's Church. {PLAYGROUP}is for little childen it is held on Monday, Wednesday and Friday. It is held at the pavilion in the Sports Field. {CUBS}and{SCOUTS}meet on Monday and Tuesday evenings at the Scout Hut.
